		url (line 42)
	
 
	
	

Generates an url given the name of a route.

	
    
				
  • return: Url for the link href attribute.
    • 
				
  • access: public
    • 
			

	
	

		string
		
			url
		
					([array $urlOptions = array()], [mixed $name = null], [ $reset = false])
			

	
			
    
					
  • 
				array
				$urlOptions: Options passed to the assemble method of the Route object.			
    • 
					
  • 
				mixed
				$name: The name of a Route to use. If null it will use the current Route
